about_the_game:
• Original pixel art and soundtrack: a game crafted in the style of classic 16-bit era titles.
  • Existential and subjective story: experience the consequences of an uncertain past in an ancient and mysterious city.
  • Fast-paced rogue-lite with level progression inspired by games like Touhou and Cave Story. Collect XP and feel your evolution as you obtain different power-ups, facing waves of enemies, each more challenging than the last.
  • Multiple endings and achievements.

short_description: Night Poetry is a story-driven rogue-lite RPG with an existential and subjective narrative! Face waves of enemies, collect XP, and experience your evolution by obtaining various power-ups, while uncovering the consequences of an uncertain past in an ancient and mysterious city...
